Room.Name: Main Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Main Street, heading east and west. Nylandian Bay is to the west.
Room.LongDescription: A very loud and chaotic noise breaks out from the Grinning Sailor Pub to the south. The pub appears to be a popular hangout for sailors and their comrades. Unfortunately, there are also a lot of drunks and other vagrants who pester the incoming patrons for a gold piece or a spot of whiskey. To the west lies Nylandian Bay. Main Street continues to the east, heading towards the geographic center of town.
